The patrol passes without incident, and app1 can't help casting a look back at the border as {PRONOUN/app1/subject} {VERB/app1/leave/leaves}.

intro_text: Your cats hear some yowling from up in the branches of the trees.
decline_text: Your cats figure it could be dangerous, so they leave the yowling behind.

success_outcomes.text: Your cats find a kittypet stuck in a tree. They tell the kittypet that they can help them down, and teach them how to climb trees and hunt. The kittypet agrees to join the clan.

Your cats find a kittypet stuck in a tree. They tell the kittypet that they can help them down, and they inform the kittypet about clan life. The kittypet agrees to join the clan- so long as they are helped down!
Your cats find a kittypet stuck in a tree. They help the kittypet down, and grateful for help, the kittypet decides to check out clan life.

fail_outcomes.text: Your cats find a kittypet stuck in a tree. They tell the kittypet that they can help them down, and teach them how to climb trees and hunt. However, the kittypet decides that waiting for their twolegs is better than joining the clan.

Your cats find a kittypet stuck in a tree. They tell the kittypet that they can help them down, and they inform the kittypet about clan life. However, the kittypet decides that waiting for their twolegs is better than joining the clan.

The patrol hears a THUD in the distance, and the yowls go silent. Investigating, they find the cooling body of a kittypet on the forest floor. It seems they fell down from it, and didn't land on their feet.

antag_fail_outcomes.text: Your cats discover a kittypet stuck in the branches of a tree. They're not supposed to be on clan territory, so p_l climbs up the tree and tries to teach the kittypet a lesson, but the kittypet hits them first, sending them back down.

antag_success_outcomes.text: Your cats discover a kittypet stuck in the branches of a tree. They're not supposed to be on clan territory, so p_l climbs up the tree and gives the kittypet a nasty scratch, which is all they need to do for the kittypet to jump down and run off.

intro_text: Your patrol ventures along the sandy shores, the rhythmic sound of the waves providing a soothing backdrop. Suddenly, r_c spots a stranded Dolphin, its sleek body glimmering in the sunlight.
decline_text: Your patrol, feeling a mixture of sympathy and helplessness, decides to leave the Dolphin alone hoping the dolphin can sort itself out.

success_outcomes.text: Your patrol ingeniously crafts a route to guide the Dolphin back to the ocean. With careful teamwork, the Dolphin swims away gracefully, coming back with some herbs before vanishing off.

Your patrol gently flips the Dolphin onto its side and ushers it back into the ocean. With patient determination, you guide the creature through the waves until it regains its freedom. The Dolphin gives a flick of its tail in acknowledgment before disappearing into the deep blue.

fail_outcomes.text: Despite your patrols best efforts, the Dolphin proves too heavy for your patrol to bring back to the water. With heavy hearts, you abandon the rescue attempt and return home, the Dolphin's fate weighing heavily on your minds.

The stranded Dolphin, frightened and distressed, lashes out in fear, leaving r_c with bruises and scrapes. The patrol is forced to retreat, unable to help the creature without risking further injuries.
Time slips away as your patrol struggles to guide the Dolphin back to the ocean. Despite p_l's best efforts, the creature succumbs to overheating and dehydration.

antag_fail_outcomes.text: The patrol kills the dolphin without hesitation, knowing it would be valuable food. However when they returned to camp, the clan was deeply disappointed in the patrols choice and questioned their judgment, leading to strained relationships and increased tension within c_n between the patrol and the clan.

antag_success_outcomes.text: Your patrol kills the Dolphin and brings it back to camp as prey. The clan praises the patrols hunting skills, and the cats eat well.

intro_text: The patrol hears a wail for help near the beach.
decline_text: The patrol decides it's not their problem, and continues to patrol the borders.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol goes to see a cat drowning. r_c swims out to save the cat and asks them why they were so far out. r_c talked about their clan to the strange cat, who said they were abandoned by their twolegs. r_c offers them shelter in their clan and the ex-kittypet agreed.

fail_outcomes.text: The patrol sees a drowning cat and helps to rescue them, but the cat rudely hisses at them afterwards and spits out that they don't want help from clan cats.

intro_text: Despite the harsh chill of Leaf-bare, the patrol sets out to mark the borders. Led by a seasoned warrior and accompanied by determined apprentices they brave the cold to ensure the clan's territory remains secure.
decline_text: Realizing the challenge of sending out a patrol with only one warrior in leaf-bare, the deputy hesitates. Concerns about the safety of the apprentices lead to the decision to call the patrol back to camp. The apprentices return disappointed but understanding.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol successfully marks the borders despite the freezing conditions. The apprentices, under the watchful eye of the warrior, learn valuable lessons about border patrol. p_l shares their expertise, strengthening the bond between the apprentices and the warrior.

fail_outcomes.text: The apprentices' lack of experience becomes evident in the face of leaf-bare's harshness. Despite their efforts, the borders remain poorly marked. The patrol returns to camp, their mission unaccomplished. p_l feels the weight of responsibility but remains determined to guide the apprentices to success in future patrols.

s_c snaps at the apprentices under their watch, scaring them off and ruining the patrol. The apprentices, including app1, app2, app3, app4, and app5, are shaken and fearful of s_c's aggressive behavior, leading to a deepening distrust and dislike among them.

intro_text: Your patrol is wandering around the border, making sure they were marked, when suddenly, the desperate yowls of a cat cry out, sending shivers down r_c's spine. The patrol stops, their senses on high alert, trying to pinpoint the source of the distress.
decline_text: Your patrol, though concerned, decides not to investigate the source of the yowls and continues their patrol cautiously, aware of the dangers lurking in the shadows.

success_outcomes.text: Your patrol discovers a kittypet trapped in a deep hole, cleverly concealed beneath leaves and debris. Working together seamlessly, r_c and p_l manage to rescue the cat. Impressed by their bravery and kindness, the cat decides to join the clan. With a warm welcome, p_l ushers them into c_n ranks. The former kittypet, now a clan member, adopts the new name n_c:0.

fail_outcomes.text: Despite the patrol's best efforts, they are unsuccessful in saving the trapped cat. With heavy hearts, p_l is forced to leave the cat behind, surrounding the hole with brambles to prevent others from falling in.

antag_fail_outcomes.text: Although the trapped cat is saved, the patrol decides to chase them off clan territory, ensuring they don't cause any harm to c_n.

antag_success_outcomes.text: p_l orders the patrol to bury the cat, even as they begged for help. p_l believes it isn't worth the risk of having them potentially injure the clan in the future.

intro_text: The patrol is on the border of o_c_n... should they fight them and show their power?
decline_text: The patrol decides not to make enemies with o_c_n

success_outcomes.text: The patrol fought hard against o_c_n, killing off a few warriors before heading back.

fail_outcomes.text: The patrol had been too eager, and ended up fleeing after o_c_n killed r_c.
Despite the patrols best efforts, o_c_n was too strong, and sent them fleeing back to their own territory.

intro_text: As the patrol heads out, they find a scent of an unknown cat on their territory.
decline_text: The patrol ignores the scent and continues the patrol.
